verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Themanite \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

If \w we|strong="H1697"\w* begin \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w perhaps|strong="H4310"\w* thou wilt take it ill, \w but|strong="H0413"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* withhold \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3201"\w* hath conceived?

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* thou hast \w taught|strong="H3256"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thou hast \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* weary \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*:

Thy \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* \w confirmed|strong="H6965"\w* them \w that|strong="H6965"\w* \w were|strong="H4405"\w* staggering, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* thou hast \w strengthened|strong="H0553"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* trembling \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* scourge \w is|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou faintest: \w it|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou art troubled.

\w Where|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* thy \w fear|strong="H3373"\w*, thy fortitude, thy patience, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* perfection \w of|strong="H1870"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w I|strong="H2142"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w ever|strong="H4310"\w* \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* \w being|strong="H0006"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*? \w or|strong="H2142"\w* \w when|strong="H2142"\w* were \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w just|strong="H3477"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*?

\w On|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* contrary \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w work|strong="H5999"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* sorrows, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*,

\w Perishing|strong="H0006"\w* \w by|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w blast|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \w by|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H3615"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6963"\w* \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* lioness, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* whelps \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w broken|strong="H5421"\w*:

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* tiger hath \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* \w for|strong="H0006"\w* \w want|strong="H1097"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* lions \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6504"\w* abroad.

Now there \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* private, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w stealth|strong="H1589"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* veins \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w its|strong="H3947"\w* \w whisper|strong="H8102"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* horror \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w vision|strong="H2384"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* wont \w to|strong="H5921"\w* hold \w men|strong="H0376"\w*,

\w Fear|strong="H6343"\w* seized upon me, \w and|strong="H6343"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7460"\w*, \w and|strong="H6343"\w* \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w my|strong="H6106"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w were|strong="H6343"\w* affrighted:

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w passed|strong="H2498"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* stood \w up|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w There|strong="H5975"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* whose countenance \w I|strong="H3808"\w* knew \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w an|strong="H8085"\w* image \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w as|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* gentle wind:

\w Shall|strong="H2891"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* \w in|strong="H0518"\w* comparison \w of|strong="H0433"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H2891"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* more \w pure|strong="H2891"\w* \w than|strong="H0518"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* maker?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* steadfast, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* found wickedness:

\w How|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H0637"\w* \w more|strong="H0637"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* clay, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* earthly \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w*, \w be|strong="H1004"\w* consumed \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w moth|strong="H6211"\w*?

\w From|strong="H0006"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* till \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w they|strong="H1242"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5331"\w* cut \w down|strong="H3807"\w*: \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w one|strong="H1097"\w* understandeth, \w they|strong="H1242"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w for|strong="H6153"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2451"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w left|strong="H5265"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* taken away \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w them|strong="H4191"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
